lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''After Defeat, Journey to Uncertain Fate'' (front page, Nov. 28): Given the cooperative nature of this offensive, I wonder: What is the responsibility of the United States in determining the fate of prisoners of war? If American bombing helps bring about the capture of Taliban soldiers, does the United States have a responsibility for their fate?
abstract: T Elijah Hawkes letter questions who will be responsible for determining fate of prisoners of war in Afghanistan (Nov 28 article)
